creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund and Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Darwin Reedy
description: spherical gourd topped by wooden half figure; symbolic objects hung about waist; has own mount; organic material stuffed in ears and inside antelope horn
markings: \'FX 9676\' painted at back top edge on gourd at waist
medium: Wood, gourd, snakeskin, shells, seeds, antelope horn
text: This sculptural figure on a calabash gourd and its shells, horn and seed pods constitute a microcosmic world of power associated with divination and secret societies dealing with healing and social justice.
title: Power Figure
